sense.def:
A volunteer
je oseba, ki opravlja delo, za katero ne dobi plačila.

seg.quote: Teaching literacy to adults using volunteers began in 1963.

sense.def:
A volunteer
je tudi oseba, ki se pridruži oboroženim silam, zlasti med vojno. Nasprotje tem ljudem so vpoklicani vojaki.

seg.quote: Many Australians fought as volunteers on the Allied side.

sense.def:
To volunteer to do something
pomeni ponuditi, da nekaj naredimo sami, ne da bi nas kdo v to prisilil.

seg.quote: He volunteered to do whatever he could for them.
...an extra payment to those who volunteer for redundancy.

sense.def:
To volunteer information
pomeni posredovati podatke, ne da bi nas kdo zanje prosil;

seg.quote: I volunteered no explanation for our visit.
‘It's all fascinating and intriguing,’ Maria volunteered.
